result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mark J. Tucker

records.addlTxt:
CASES: PH in 22CF339, 22CF380, 22CF445 & STC in 21CM64, 22CF132, 22CF323, 22CM45. 10:18 am. JL-Clerk. Defendant Mark J Tucker in court, in custody.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Mark J Tucker.  Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin. 
22CF380, 22CF445: Def waives PH. CT accepts waiver. CT finds PC, Def bound over for trial. 
22CF339: State calls Deputy Neumann - S&T. CT finds identification made. State req CT take JN of bond in 22CF132. CT takes JN. CT finds PC, Def bound over for trial. Bonds cont. 10:30 am adj.
Arraignment scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.

CASES 21CM64, 22CF132, 22CF323, 22CF339, 22CM45, 22CF380. 3:50 PM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Mark J Tucker in court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Mark J Tucker.  Prosecuting attorney David Stilin in court for the State of Wisconsin. CT quashes warrant, reinstates bond. Bond cont. 3:53 pm adj.
Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

CASES 21CM64, 22CF132, 22CF323, 22CF339, 22CM45, 22CF380. 11:05 AM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Mark J Tucker not in court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Mark J Tucker.  Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin. State req warrants in all files. CT authorizes warrants in CF files, geo to WI/MN and in CM files, geo to WI. 11:06 am adj.

CASES: 22CF339 & 22CF380 (Prelim), 22CM45, 22CF323, 22CF132, 21CM64 (STC) 2:34 PM Defendant Mark J. Tucker in court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Mark J. Tucker.  Attorney ADA Stilin in court for State of Wisconsin. Officer Vanessa Neumann S&T. CT takes judicial notice of document 5 in file 22CF132. ADA Stilin questions Officer Neumann. CT adjourns both cases and reschedules. 22CF380 Time limits waived. Bond Cont. adj. 2:44 pm
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Case Reassignment Order - Br 1 to Br 2

No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion. Not to possess or use drugs without a prescription or drug paraphernalia.

1:10 PM Defendant Mark J. Tucker appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Donna Burger in court . AW-clerk.  Atty Burger - DE Does qualify.  DE does have CC.  CT-addresses DE.  Atty Burger waive reading.  State requests additional money for bond.   Atty Burger addresses court regarding bond.  CT-addresses DE regarding next hearing.  CT-sets bond.  1:18 pm adj
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
